body_html: TensorFlow officially supports NVIDIA GPU. For using AMD gpu you have to compile TensorFlow using OpenCL. Please read this setup guide to get more insights on TensorFlow AMD Setup.
body_text: TensorFlow officially supports NVIDIA GPU. For using AMD gpu you have to compile TensorFlow using OpenCL. Please read this setup guide to get more insights on TensorFlow AMD Setup.
body: TensorFlow officially supports NVIDIA GPU. For using AMD gpu you have to compile TensorFlow using OpenCL. Please read this [setup guide](https://developer.codeplay.com/computecppce/latest/getting-started-with-tensorflow) to get more insights on TensorFlow AMD Setup.
